Error.Message: 應在main裡使用 Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in); 再將其程式碼加在後面 System.out.println("輸入長"); double length= scanner.nextDouble(); System.out.println("輸入寬"); double width = scanner.nextDouble(); System.out.println("輸入高"); double height= scanner.nextDouble();
物件宣告動作內 應為 this.length = length; this.width = width; this.height = height;

public static double Surface(double length, double width, double height) public static double Volume(double length, double width, double height) 此兩段程式碼為宣告物件動作 後面()內應改為 public static double Surface() public static double Volume() 括弧內不需重複宣告
